input.sentences: so i found some really cool art in the attic this morning . this is a black and white painting of my mother | [female] .
she grew up in this big beautiful house on location location .
this was her favorite spot to go in the winter to think and paint .
this one is my favorite painting i found . it 's of 2 churches on location location .
the last painting i found in the attic this morning was this really neat one of a man and a cow . i believe it 's my great uncle .
output.sentences: In Ana's art portfolio, first you will see a back, and white painting of her mother.
Next, her favorite location which is the house that she grew up in.
In the Winter, she had a vacation spot which is why she painted that scene.
The next painting is a location found only in her dreams of an old school building on top of a hill.
Finally, her uncle had inspired the final painting of a man walking toward a neat house to take a rest during an approaching storm.
